posts.post_title: For Sale - T206 Doc Adkins, Piedmont 350...Cheap!
posts.post_content:
Update - Card is Sold!

[url=http://postimg.org/image/u6dxa6w8n/][img]http://s31.postimg.org/u6dxa6w8n/doc.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://postimg.org/image/m25t5g9tj/][img]http://s31.postimg.org/m25t5g9tj/docback.jpg[/img][/url]

A glorious card with nice contrast. Definitely trimmed, 75% of the white border is gone. Card retains a small crease as well - however, you won't find an Adkins cheaper than this! I'm asking $7.50 PayPal f+f for this card. Let me know if you have any interest by sending a PM or via email here:
[url]njdunkin1@gmail.com[/url]

Thank you!
NJ
